wiki.text:
'BTI' or 'Bti' may refer to:

;Acronyms
* Bacillus thuringiensis israelensis (Bti), a bacterium
* Barisan Tani Indonesia, the Indonesian farmers movement; see Peasants Front
  of Indonesia
* Baron Tornado Index, a measure of the probability of a tornado inside a
  Tornadic Vortex Signature
* Beverage Testing Institute
* Blistein Teachers Institute of Hebrew Theological College in Skokie, Illinois
* Boston Theological Institute
* Boyce Thompson Institute for Plant Research, a research institute of Cornell
  University (Ithaca, New York)
* Btrieve Technologies, Inc.
* Bicycle Technologies International, a global distributor of bicycle components
  and accessories based in Santa Fe, New Mexico

;Codes and symbols
* Barter Island LRRS Airport (IATA airport code: BTI) on Barter Island in
  Alaska, United States
* British American Tobacco PLC (American Stock Exchange symbol: BTI)
wiki.title: BTI
